channel.title: The elder scrolls online
channel.description:
Beta signup now available!
http://signup.elderscrollsonline.com/
How do you guys think Bethesda is going to handle an online game? I'm looking forward to this, hopefully no let downs.

item.title: The elder scrolls online
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I’ll stick to WoW ot EQ:NEXT thanks

Read full topic

item.title: The elder scrolls online
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Don’t realize how good wow is until I try and play another mmo. You take those 10 years of refinements for granted until you’re forced to play some other clunky mmo. Even though WoW is bleh compared to what it used to be

Read full topic

Landmark is great, developers are great and EQ:N will be great.

i downloaded the beta only to be told the file was currupted and it wanted to re download all 22gb. I promptly deleted the game.

Read full topic

item.title: The elder scrolls online
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

It’s not as great as you think. The game is insanely empty and it will no doubt go free to play before 2015. It does feel like a watered down TES game though.

Quests are walking simulators, TOO MUCH fucking text. They need a tl;dr option because everyone speaks a fucking novel, yes you can skip it.

Graphics are good
Crafting is neat
Combat is fun

thats about it, if pvp is good it may make the game fun but it still won’t be worth $15 a month. And even if they switch it to f2p that means theyll use microtransactions for money so I wont play at all

SO many people requested TES just be coop. Just have another player adventuring with you and not even worked into the story, I don’t know why they took this as “we want an mmo”

Read full topic

item.title: The elder scrolls online
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

How much like a MMO or a TES game is this?

Tried getting in the beta but no go

@Frell you can’t skip NPC text?

Read full topic

item.title: The elder scrolls online
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:34, topic:521184”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=639697.msg4405036#msg4405036 date=1391663435]

just got an email for beta.

I won’t be playing so if anyone didn’t sign up and would like a beta key, you can have mine.

I have a BETA key as well, If anyone else wants it. ;p

my friend is pissed that I got in and he didn’t

would you like to help out here lol? <3 he’s a bigger fan than me and he got me into the series

Lol, sure. I’ll PM you tomorrow, as im heading to bed soon.

[/quote]
He’s in the military so downloading the large client will take ages, any chance you could send it tonight so he can get a head start?[/quote]
In that case, give me like 3 minutes.

Edit: Sent. (:

Read full topic
